typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy']) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{MeterPoint Code},
		{Date/Time},
		{Data Type},
		{Data Value}
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy({Date/Time} = {Date/Time},
		{MeterPoint Code} = {MeterPoint Code},
		{Data Type} = {Data Type}),
	{Average Value} = avg({Data Value}),
		{Minimum Value} = min({Data Value}),
		{Maximum Value} = max({Data Value}),
		{Median Value} = mean({Data Value})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		DateTime as date,
		{Meterpoint Code} as string,
		{Data Type} as string,
		{Average Value} as double,
		{Minimum Value} as double,
		{Maximum Value} as double,
		{Median Value} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		DateTime = {Date/Time},
		{Meterpoint Code} = {MeterPoint Code},
		{Data Type},
		{Average Value},
		{Minimum Value},
		{Maximum Value},
		{Median Value}
	)) ~> TransformedDataToSQL
